verbs.description: [ARG0: Donald Trump] [ARGM-ADV: just] [V: shouted] out [ARG1: Kanye West] [ARGM-TMP: during his speech at the NRA Convention] ... [ARGM-PRP: for giving him a boost in the polls] .
Donald Trump just shouted out Kanye West during his speech at the NRA Convention ... for [V: giving] [ARG2: him] [ARG1: a boost in the polls] .
